page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {BULLDOG'S CHARGE { This is a very good game but you need quite a lot of people to play it. The rules of the game are simple.When you have made up your mind who is going to be on then the rest of the people stand with their backs against the wall.The person who is on stands about four yards in front of the others and calls out the name of one of the people against the wall and they have to try to get passed the person who is on. When you are about half way across you shout"BULLDOGS' CHARGE" and the rest of the people try to get across the field without being touched.If you are touched then you help the person who is on to catch the others. STOP PRESS The game is now banned because of too many injured children!
